descriptions.overview: The Master Lock M930XDLJ solid body padlock features a 2-1/2 in. (64 mm) wide solid steel body for maximum strength and reliability. The 7/16 in. (11 mm) diameter octagonal shackle is 2 in. (51 mm) long and made of Tough-Cut boron-carbide, 50% harder than hardened steel, offering maximum resistance to cutting and sawing. The 5-pin cylinder prevents picking and the dual locking ball bearings provide maximum resistance against prying and hammering. The covered keyway offers maximum weather protection, and reinforced body bumper protects against scratches. The lifetime guarantee provides peace of mind from a brand you know and Can trust.
list: Indoor and outdoor padlock; maximum security padlock with Tough-Cut octagonal boron-carbide shackle is best used as a gate lock, shed lock, and storage locker lock

Lock features solid steel construction for increased strength and security, with a protective bumper for scratch resistance, and keyway cover for weather protection; removable cylinder provides ability to rekey your lock
Five-pin cylinder and dual ball bearing locking mechanism provides maximum pick and pry resistance; Tough-Cut octagonal boron-carbide shackle is 50% harder than hardened steel
2-1/2 in. (64 mm) wide lock body; 7/16 in. (11 mm) diameter shackle with 2-1/2 in. (64 mm) length, 15/16 in. (24 mm) width; extended shackle for application flexibility

reviews.title: "Heavy Duty Lock!"
reviews.text: This lock has incredible heft to it. It appears to be a very solidly built lock and should make all but the most determined thieves look elsewhere. After all, if there's a will, there's a way. If I were to complain about anything, it would be the rubber weather seal at the base of the lock. This is the only design flaw in its outer appearance. If it gets caught or pulled at the corner, it will separate from the body of the lock. This said, it does not appear to affect the overall effectiveness of the lock. I would still recommend its purchase to anyone.
reviews.author: LongHaulTrucker

reviews.title: "Does the job well"
reviews.text: Extremely strong padlock for outside use. The protected keyway is very good. This lock is exposed to all the weather and seems to be working well.
reviews.author: Skip

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: James

reviews.title: "great lock, wish it was rekeyable."
reviews.text: I bought eight of these locks all together in the beginning from three different Lowes stores. four that all keyed out of the same box, then two, and then the final two. after taking them to a locksmith to have them all keyed the same I found out that they are not rekeyable. in fact the locksmith destroyed one of them in the process and had to pay me for it. so I returned the other three to Lowes leaving me the original four. I had the folks in hardware call master lock to see about ordering me another set, and that was a dead end too. as far as the locks themselves go the are very stout solidly built locks. I have no doubt that these will not be hacked picked or pried easily at all. all together a good purchase for anyone who is serious about security, so long as no more then four keyed alike are required.
reviews.author: wolf

reviews.title: "Lock is failing after about a year"
reviews.text: Solid build and worked good for about a year. Now I'm having a tough time opening the lock. I have to play with key in the lock many times to turn the tumbler to release the lock. Both keys are original and only one of the keys was used regularly. The other key is still like new. Oiling didn't help either. I'll have to contact Master for service.
reviews.author: GADirtroads

reviews.title: "Fell apart after 6 months"
reviews.text: The rubber piece on the bottom of the lock got damaged very quickly because it was not properly fastened to the bottom of the lock and after about 6 months one of the internal screws came loose and it literally fell apart locking onto a vehicle we own and it had to be cut off...
reviews.author: ccr

reviews.title: "Trailer"
reviews.text: Salesperson said would work on tongue of camper and mowing trailer. It won't. The shank is too big. Good lock for other use. Heavy duty
reviews.author: Jillybean

reviews.title: "Can't get a extra key made"
reviews.text: Went to Lowe's to have a extra key made for this lock that I bought at Lowe's and was told that they didn't have a blank to fit it, true value does not have a blank to fit it and wal mart was out of a blank that fit it.
reviews.author: Lewy

reviews.title: "Great Product & fine purchase."
reviews.text: I think Lowe's stores great and easy to maneuver around,clean & nit.Though friendliness is not enough & needs to be push on more.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.text: The rubber weather protector over the key hole came off and it is not possible to reattach. Poor design. The lock still works but for the money this was not a good deal.
reviews.author: Jerry

reviews.title: "peace of mind"
reviews.text: Nothing beats having peace of mind, and this Master lock delivers at least some peace of mind in an increasingly dangerous world. Having security means everything, and the best that Master lock delivers really helps.
reviews.author: nick

reviews.title: "Padlock and Shed"
reviews.text: This padlock popped up when I ordered the Shed online, so I assumed they went together. The padlock does not fit through the hole in the shed so I have to spend time returning it.
reviews.author: Sue

reviews.title: "A truly master lock"
reviews.text: We bought this lock due to its #8/10 rating for weather ability and strength. Previous cheaper locks had started to rust outdoors, so it was time to invest in something better.
reviews.author: Frank

reviews.title: "Does what it was purchased for perfectly."
reviews.text: This lock is strong enough and long enough to pass through several layers of chain, and the keys at cover keeps rain out of the mechanism well too.
reviews.author: Mitch

reviews.title: "Maximum Security"
reviews.text: When the lock's appearance deters those thinking about breaching, the size and weight will convince a thief to go elsewhere to a easier target.
reviews.author: Huntjaiyen

reviews.title: "Master magnum lock"
reviews.text: Perfect for the U-Haul I used and now my shed. Definitely think my stuff is safe with this lock!
reviews.author: Dillon

reviews.title: "No keys"
reviews.text: Item was on the shelf.  Upon getting home I discovered that there were no keys in the package.
reviews.author: Chris

reviews.title: "Master Lock"
reviews.text: Not your father's padlock.This thing is built like a tank but operates smoothly.
reviews.author: Scott

reviews.title: "Great Lock"
reviews.text: Great lock to secure with a chain or other application.   Very heavy duty!
reviews.author: seaczar

reviews.title: "Not worth the trouble"
reviews.text: Bought the lock, went to put it on, wouldn't lock , wouldn't move at all.
reviews.author: Grunt

reviews.title: "Master lock magnum"
reviews.text: This is a wonderful heavy duty padlock. Very tough and rugged.
reviews.author: Jake

reviews.title: "Strong lock"
reviews.text: Seems solid and strong. Sticks a little on opening
reviews.author: Ace

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: Can't cut this one their!!!

questions.question: "How many keys come with the lock?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: carrieinwi
answers.text: two keys come with the lock

questions.question: "Will this lock hold up to bolt cutters?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Debbie
answers.text: yes it will as per specs

questions.question: "Will this lock fit the door on pens keep rental truck"
questions.author: Skippy

answers.author: MasterLockCompany
answers.text: The shackle diameter for this product is 7/16in (11mm). Please contact your rental truck company to find out the diameter of the door latch.

questions.question: "Can this lock be keyed to match a key I furnish?"
questions.author: Anonymous
